item.description:
Come experience CODZILLA! better known as a "Water Coaster." Codzilla swerves, curves, and spins as it rips through Boston Harbor. Music blares and waves splash during this 40 minute ride of sensational fun.

Codzilla has twin turbo-charged engines and roams the ocean with 2,800 horsepower and speeds up to 40mpr.

Buy advance tickets online, likely to be sold out, order ticket now: http://www.bostonharb....

We will meet at 12:30 for a light lunch and then board Codzilla for the 2:00pm ride - don't be late lets get a good seat! If you choose to skip lunch, we will meet you on the boat

Where to meet: At the Boston Harbor Cruise BHC ticket booth by the Aquarium, directly across from Legal Seafoods.

Rain - light rain we will still go, heavy rain we can transfer tickets to another day, and if they have to cancel the ride we can get a full refund. Hopefully this won't be an issue - fingers crossed!!

Carpooling and group train rides highly suggested - please post in your RSVP if you'd like to do either.
item.name: CODZILLA!!
